1370: Ripperti was born in Mooierstraet in 1370.
Got married to Riet at age 23 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Riet, Reynildis, at age 23.
1372: Had a daughter with Riet, Hilduardis, at age 25.
1373: Had a daughter with Riet, Nellen, at age 26.
1374: Had a daughter with Riet, Sybillia, at age 27.
1375: Had a daughter with Riet, Jute, at age 28.
1376: Had a daughter with Riet, Rabburgis, at age 29.
1377: Had a son with Riet, Barwoud, at age 30.
1383: Had a daughter with Riet, Meynseth, at age 36.
1385: Had a son with Riet, Waldfridus, at age 38.
1389: Had a daughter with Riet, Volcwiif, at age 42.
Lost daughter Volcwiif when Volcwiif was 1 years old.
